41 years ago (1983)HeadquartersMumbai, Maharashtra, IndiaKey peopleGautam Adani (Chairman) Suresh Kumar Neotia (Founder)Narotam Sekhsaria (Co-Founder and Chairman Emeritus)[1] Ajay Kapur (Whole-time Director & CEO)[2]ProductsCementRevenue ₹18,772 crore (US$2.2 billion) (2024)[3]Operating income ₹3,103 crore (US$370 million) (2024)[3]Net income ₹2,335 crore (US$280 million) (2024)[3]Total assets ₹44,129 crore (US$5.3 billion) (2024)[3]Total equity ₹37,006 crore (US$4.4 billion) (2024)[3]OwnerAdani Group (63.2%)Number of employees4,330(2024)[3]ParentAdani GroupWebsitewww.ambujacement.com\nAmbuja Cements Limited, formerly known as Gujarat Ambuja Cement Limited (GACL), is a major Indian cement producing company.[4] The Group markets cement and clinker for both domestic and export markets.\n\nPartnership[edit]\nThe company had entered into a strategic partnership with Holcim, the second-largest cement manufacturer in the world from 2006. Holcim had, in January, bought a 14.8 percent promoters' stake in the GACL for ₹2,140 crore.[5]\nFrom 2010 to 2022, Holcim held a 61.62% controlling stake in Ambuja Cements.[6] On 14 April 2022, Holcim announced that it would exit from the Indian market after 17 years of operations as part of a strategy to focus on core markets, and listed its stakes in Ambuja Cements and ACC for sale.[7] On May 15, 2022, Adani Group acquired Holcim's stake in Ambuja Cements and ACC for US$10.5 billion.[8]\n\nAmbuja Tower corporate office in Ahmedabad\n\nAmbuja Cements plant in Darlaghat, Himachal Pradesh\n\nAmbuja Cements grinding unit in Howrah\n\nSee also[edit]\n\nCompanies portal\nTarachand Ghanshyamdas\nReferences[edit]\n\n^ \"Sharp rise in Gujarat Ambuja trading volumes, share price Market buzz on Holcim interest\". List files in directory: List files in directory(directory: 'string') - A tool that can be used to recursively list a directory's content.

Write File: Write File(directory_name: str, file_name: str, content: str) -> str - Writes a file with the given content to the specified directory within the project directory.
Scrape Website: Scrape Website(objective: str, url: str) -> str - Scrapes a website and optionally summarizes its content based on the given objective.
Download and Save PDF: Download and Save PDF(directory_name: str, pdf_url: str) -> str - Downloads a PDF from the given URL and saves it to the specified directory within the project directory.

Use the following format:

Thought: you should always think about what to do
Action: the action to take, only one name of [List files in directory, Read a file's content, Write File, Scrape Website, Download and Save PDF], just the name, exactly as it's written.
Action Input: the input to the action, just a simple a python dictionary, enclosed in curly braces, using " to wrap keys and values.
Observation: the result of the action

Thought: I now know the final answer
Final Answer: the final answer to the original input question

Description: About Us - Ambuja Help Cement: Building India's Future

EnquiryAboutVision/PurposeMissionCorporate VideoAbout AmbujaAmbuja Cements Ltd is India’s foremost cement company known for its hassle-free, home-building solutions. Unique products tailor-made for Indian climatic conditions, sustainable operations and initiatives that advance the company’s philosophy of contributing to the larger good of the society, have made it the most trusted cement brand in India. 
The company has many firsts to its credit – a captive port with four terminals that has facilitated timely, cost-effective, cleaner shipments of bulk cement to its customers. To further add value to our customers, the company has launched innovative products like Ambuja Plus, Ambuja Cool Walls, Ambuja Kawach and Ambuja Cement Compocem. The new products not only fulfil important customer needs but also help in significantly reducing carbon footprints. 
With Ambuja help we aim to reach out to home builders across the nation who wish to make their home-building journey effortless, well-informed and an enjoyable experience. Ambuja's expertise and high-quality cement solutions can offer home builders the much-needed assurance of reliability and durability. 
Ultimately, it is our aim to make our home builder’s experience of home-building a successful endeavour, which they can celebrate for years!  Read More0.00Million tonnes of cement capacity0Integrated manufacturing units0Grinding units0Bulk Cement terminalsVisionTo be a world class leader in businesses that enrich lives and contribute to nations in building infrastructure through sustainable value creation.PurposeCommitted to Building Nations with Goodness.MissionTo be the largest, most innovative, efficient and sustainable cement & building materials company in the world, creating value & enriching lives of people and employees.  

Accelerated Growth by significant capacity ramp up as well as inorganic growth. 
Market leadership and Premium product offering to achieve customer delight. 
Operational excellence through Best-in-class production facilities and most cost-efficient operations. 
Efficient supply chain network and Digitization to reach the last mile.
Be a world class talent platform and a preferred, diverse & inclusive place to work for.
Sustainable value enhancement for stakeholders on group values and strong principles of ESG.
Develop sustainable future for community and society at large.
Safety, innovation and Agility at the core and a world class talent pool to drive excellence.
Read MoreCorporate VideoAbout Ambuja HelpOffering our patrons with the best has always been Ambuja Cements' unwavering commitment and foremost priority. We take immense pride in delivering construction materials of unparalleled quality, strength, and reliability, ensuring that every project stands the test of time and upholds the highest standards of excellence. We aspire to be a driving force and a guiding influence in the journey of our home-builders as they create their dream space and Ambuja Help is a way to do just that.  Ambuja Help is designed to empower our home-builders with all the relevant information under one roof, which they can consume, implement and realise their vision with confidence and ease. Home-builders can go through our comprehensive home-building guide for some handy tips they can keep in mind or find an authentic Ambuja Help dealer, who can help them procure the right materials for their project or use the easy-peasy cost calculator to get a reliable estimate for their home-building. 
If they can’t find something on the platform, they can submit a query by providing basic details. Our dedicated experts will promptly reach out to you, providing the necessary assistance and addressing any queries or concerns to ensure a seamless experience. 
Ambuja Help is here to assist you as you navigate through every phase of your project. We want to be a part of your decision-making while achieving the dream space you've envisioned.  
Your satisfaction is, above all, our priority, and with our home-building solutions we aspire to transform your home into an unrivalled masterpiece! About Ambuja Cement
Ambuja Cements Ltd is India’s foremost cement company known for its hassle-free, home-building solutions. Unique products tailor-made for Indian climatic conditions, sustainable operations and initiatives that advance the company’s philosophy of contributing to the larger good of the society, have made it the most trusted cement brand in India.

List files in directory: List files in directory(directory: 'string') - A tool that can be used to recursively list a directory's content.
Read a file's content: Read a file's content(file_path: 'string') - A tool that can be used to read a file's content.

Download and Save PDF: Download and Save PDF(directory_name: str, pdf_url: str) -> str - Downloads a PDF from the given URL and saves it to the specified directory within the project directory.

List files in directory: List files in directory(directory: 'string') - A tool that can be used to recursively list a directory's content.
Read a file's content: Read a file's content(file_path: 'string') - A tool that can be used to read a file's content.
Write File: Write File(directory_name: str, file_name: str, content: str) -> str - Writes a file with the given content to the specified directory within the project directory.
Scrape Website: Scrape Website(objective: str, url: str) -> str - Scrapes a website and optionally summarizes its content based on the given objective.
Download and Save PDF: Download and Save PDF(directory_name: str, pdf_url: str) -> str - Downloads a PDF from the given URL and saves it to the specified directory within the project directory.

Agent Name: Link Collector Agent

Tool input: {"directory_name": "Ambuja Cement"}
